titleInfo.title: The interaction of word recognition and linguistic processing in speech understanding

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Niemann, Heinrich, Sagerer, Gerhard, Ehrlich, Ute, Schukat-Talamazzini, G., and Kummert, Franz. 1992. “The interaction of word recognition and linguistic processing in speech understanding”.
